text: Claude Le Jeune (1528 or 1530-1600) was a composer of the Renaissance. His most famous music was "Revecy venir du printemps". He was a Franco Flemish, possibly French composer. He was born in Valenciennes, and died in Paris. Category:1528 births Category:1530 births Category:1600 deaths Category:Flemish people Category:French composers Category:People from Nord
title: Claude Le Jeune
